column4: hello i just recovered my boot grup after installing windows and now there is screen in the begining to give me choice between ubuntu and windows but when i try to log to windows it dont log to it

hello i just recovered my boot grup after installing windows and now there is screen in the begining to give me choice between ubuntu and windows but when i try to log to windows it dont log to it ???
maybe it's trying to boot from the wrong partition
try booting off any other ntfs partition (this system reserved ntfs partition may be about 100-300 megs-- this is likely the one)
what's on sda5/6/7 (c:\ is which one?)
if u dont know you can mount the ntfs drives with the ntfs-3g module
that will list the mountpoints.. try seeing if /dev/sda5/6/7 is mounted
can u acess the desktop with nautilus or konqueror to  /media/D ,  /media/E or,  /media/F ?
see which one has "Windows" or "WINDOWS" folder..
nautilus is gnome's default file browser
